ExtensionManifest.Name: Automate Diagnostics
ExtensionManifest.Author: John Duprey - Complete Network
ExtensionManifest.ShortDescription: Diagnoses Automate Agents from CW Control. Change the LTPoSh URL in the settings.

Setting.Name: PathToLTPoSh
Setting.Description: The URL for launching LTPoSH (Defaults to http://bit.ly/LTPoSh).

Setting.Name: PathToDiag
Setting.Description: The URL for launching AutomateDiagnostics (Defaults to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/johnduprey/CWCAutomateDiagnostics/master/AutomateDiagnostics.ps1).
